title: Trump directs federal agencies to stop using Anthropic's AI tech

title: Bank Shares Walloped by More AI and ‘Cockroach’ Credit Woes
description: Financial firms ended February where they spent much of the month: enduring another dizzying blow from the threat of artificial intelligence and grappling with signs those cockroaches Jamie Dimon warned about in the world of private credit are starting to scurry.

title: Eby credits OpenAI for coming clean after mass killings in Tumbler Ridge, B.C.
description: British Columbia Premier David Eby is crediting artificial intelligence firm OpenAI for not trying to hide problematic interactions between the Tumbler Ridge shooter and its chatbot.
content:
VANCOUVER — British Columbia Premier David Eby is crediting artificial intelligence firm OpenAI for not trying to hide problematic interactions between the Tumbler Ridge shooter and its chatbot.

title: Trump orders every agency to stop using Anthropic ahead of deadline

title: Report: Senators Urge Deal in Pentagon-Anthropic AI Row
description: Senate defense leaders are urging the Pentagon and Anthropic to resolve a dispute over limits on the use of Anthropic's Claude artificial intelligence model in classified settings, as a Pentagon deadline neared that could end the company's contract.

title: Trump orders US agencies to stop use of Anthropic technology amid dispute over ethics of AI
description: Department of Defense and artificial intelligence company were unable to reach agreement before deadline
content:
Donald Trump said Friday he will direct all federal agencies to “IMMEDIATELY CEASE” all use of Anthropic technology.
The Department of Defense and Anthropic have hit an impasse with neither side backing down as a deadline for an agreement hits Friday... [3800 chars]
